headline: Just in Time for Spring, Cash App Afterpay Expands Merchant Network to Empower Smarter Spending
summary: DISTRIBUTED-WORK-MODEL/SAN FRANCISCO, May 21, 2025--Cash App Afterpay announces a fresh wave of new brands added to its network, empowering its U.S. customers with flexible payment options that can help manage their spending without compromising their lifestyle. This season’s new partnerships include Aviator Nation, Brandon Blackwood, Double D Ranchwear, Fly Fairly, Huckberry, Mejuri, Nuuds, Parke, PetMeds, Plug, Rainbow Shops, Rugs Direct, StitchFix, Turo, and many more.
